name: Color Guardian
description:
A fun game involving colors and your memory.
In Color Guardian, you must memorize a sequence of colors that will be shown and make the highest score possible.
You can challenge some family / friend to compete with you, and see who can get the highest score.
The challenge is not so great at the beginning of the game, but I doubt that you will be able to go from level 20 upwards.
How about a little brain training with a fun memory and color challenge?
Decorate, hit and win!
